title: Boat ownership by age in the U.S. 2013
summary: The statistic depicts the boat ownership rate by household income in the u.s. in 2013 . 9.4 percent of the respondents with an annual household income of greater than 100,000 u.s. dollars own a boat .
gold: The statistic depicts the boat ownership rate by age in the U.S. in 2013 . 7.5 percent of the respondents aged 45 to 64 years own a boat .
